verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: did] n't need another serious scandal , but he has one anyway .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] did [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: need] [ARG1: another serious scandal] , but he has one anyway .
Donald Trump did n't need another serious scandal , but [ARG0: he] [V: has] [ARG1: one] [ARGM-ADV: anyway] .
